newsitem.title: USA: U.S. barge rates steady-lower on call, no trade.
newsitem.headline: U.S. barge rates steady-lower on call, no trade.

text.p: U.S. barge rates were mostly steady to lower on Thursday on the St. Louis Merchants Exchange call session. No barges traded versus none on Wednesday.
- Two barges, next week, Illinois River, no bid, offered 175 percent, down five percentage points, similar.
- Two barges, next week, Mississippi, (Osceola through Cairo) no bid, offered 155 percent, down 10 percentage points, similar.
- Two barges, next week, lower Ohio river, no bid, offered 175 percent.
- Two barges, week of October 6, Illinois river, no bid, offered 210 percent.
- Two barges, week of October 27, Mid-Mississippi, bid 220 percent of tariff, no offer.
